item.text: Jacob looked up and saw that Esau was coming along with 400 men. So he divided the children among Leah, Rachel, and the two female servants.

He <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="08198" class="">servants</st> and their <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st> <st data-num="07223" class="">in front</st>, with <st data-num="03812" class="">Leah</st> and her <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st> <st data-num="0314" class="">behind</st> them, and <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> and <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="0314" class="">behind</st> them.<n id="1" />

But <st data-num="01931" class="">Jacob</st><n id="1" /> himself <st data-num="05674" class="">went on</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead of</st> them, and he <st data-num="07812" class="">bowed</st> toward the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">times</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as</st> he <st data-num="05066 05704">approached</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>.

But <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st> <st data-num="07323" class="">ran</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> him, <st data-num="02263" class="">embraced</st> him, <st data-num="05307 05921">hugged</st> his <st data-num="06677" class="">neck</st>, and <st data-num="05401" class="">kissed</st> him. Then they both <st data-num="01058" class="">wept</st>.

When Esau<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05375 05869">looked up</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> and the <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st>, he <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> are <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> people with you?” Jacob<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “The <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="02603" class="">graciously given</st><n id="4" /> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st>.”

The <st data-num="08198" class="">female servants</st> <st data-num="05066" class="">came forward</st> <st data-num="02007" class="">with</st> their <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st> and <st data-num="07812" class="">bowed down</st>.<n id="1" />
Then Leah came forward with her children and they bowed down. Finally Joseph and Rachel came forward and bowed down.
Esau then asked, “What did you intend by sending all these herds to meet me?” Jacob replied, “To find favor in your sight, my lord.”

But <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="03426" class="">have</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">plenty</st>, my <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>. <st data-num="01961" class="">Keep</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> belongs to you.”

“<st data-num="0408" class="">No</st>, <st data-num="04994" class="">please</st> take them,” <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>.<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="0518 04994">If</st> I have <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> <st data-num="02580" class="">favor</st> in your <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">accept</st><n id="2" /> my <st data-num="04503" class="">gift</st> from my <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="05921 03651">that</st> I have <st data-num="07200" class="">seen</st> your <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> and you have <st data-num="07521" class="">accepted</st> me,<n id="3" /> it is as if I have <st data-num="07200" class="">seen</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.<n id="4" />
Please take my present that was brought to you, for God has been generous to me and I have all I need.” When Jacob urged him, he took it.
Then Esau said, “Let’s be on our way! I will go in front of you.”

But Jacob<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “My <st data-num="0113" class="">lord</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st> are <st data-num="07390" class="">young</st>,<n id="2" /> and that I <st data-num="05921" class="">have to look after</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> and <st data-num="01241" class="">cattle</st> that are <st data-num="05763" class="">nursing</st> their young.<n id="3" /> If they are <st data-num="01849" class="">driven too hard</st> for even a <st data-num="0259" class="">single</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">animals</st> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.
Let my lord go on ahead of his servant. I will travel more slowly, at the pace of the herds and the children, until I come to my lord at Seir.”
So Esau said, “Let me leave some of my men with you.” “Why do that?” Jacob replied. “My lord has already been kind enough to me.”
So that same day Esau made his way back to Seir.
But Jacob traveled to Sukkoth where he built himself a house and made shelters for his livestock. That is why the place was called Sukkoth.
After he left Paddan Aram, Jacob came safely to the city of Shechem in the land of Canaan, and he camped near the city.

Then he <st data-num="07069" class="">purchased</st> the <st data-num="02513" class="">portion</st> of the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> he had <st data-num="05186" class="">pitched</st> his <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>; he bought it<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03027" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="02544" class="">Hamor</st>, <st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, for <st data-num="03967" class="">100</st> <st data-num="07192" class="">pieces of money</st>.<n id="2" />
There he set up an altar and called it “The God of Israel is God.”
